predicate.note: Frames file for 'darken' based on sentences in brown. Verbnet entry 45.4, big surprise.

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: He darkened under his heavy burn.

example.name: transitive
example.text: For a moment, anger darkened the hallway about her, and when she found her voice, anger thickened it.

example.name: pretentious literary usage
example.text: The darkening world scene, at the time of the Munich Pact, continued to trouble his mind even in his remote Virginia studio.
